quote: Best advice has been always answered your phone. I think a lot of people take that for granted and it's such an easy one.
why_clipworthy: Highlights a simple yet effective tactic for improving client relationships.
suggested_hook: Are you missing out on business by not answering your phone?

quote: This is what your house is for. This is what all the sacrifices have been for.
why_clipworthy: Illustrates the emotional and financial security homeownership can provide.
suggested_hook: How can owning a home save you in times of crisis?
